about.title: About Me
about.text: I am a web developer, yet I got my start in the design field. I went to school for graphic design,and worked in the print design industry for many years before moving over to web design and development. After many years of balancing design and development, I made a change to being a full time developer. My passion for great design makes me unique in creating pixel perfect code for web and mobile platforms.

dev.title: The Brooks Group
dev.instructions: Select welcome, then use your keyboard left/right arrows to quickly navigate
dev.text: The Brooks Group is a client that requested an in depth e-learning program based on their sales model. Working closely with an Instructional designer and media artist, I developed a series of nine interactive modules, each with its own unique learning interactions that were complex in nature, yet simple for the end user to resolve.
dev.tools: Vue JS / Vuex / Webpack / Javascript / HTML / SCSS / JSON / RESTful API / Google Sheets

dev.title: AutoDesk
dev.instructions: Open app, then use your keyboard left/right arrows to quickly navigate
dev.text: AutoDesk is a software company that needed some training based around data security. I took insight from our team and created a fun learning module based on a series of different training models.
dev.tools: Vue JS / Vuex / Webpack / Javascript / HTML / SCSS / JSON / RESTful API / Google Sheets

dev.title: Meijer
dev.instructions: Open app, then use your keyboard left/right arrows to quickly navigate
dev.text: Meijer is a national grocer and recurring client who needed training for employees on their internal software systems. I developed a series of modules focused around software 'simulation' training.
dev.tools: Vue JS / Vuex / Webpack / Javascript / HTML / SCSS / JSON / RESTful API / Google Sheets

dev.title: Timken
dev.text: Timken is a global leader in the bearing & power transmission industry. We partnered with Timken to provide sales training on multiple products in their line. This is one of eight courses in the first group that I created, group 2 consisted of 9 courses, with a total of 6 groups altogether.
dev.tools: Vue JS / Javascript / jQuery / HTML / SCSS / JSON / Gulp / Bootstrap / Google Sheets

dev.title: Unidos
dev.text: Unidos is financial institution that was in need of a web app for certain services such as bill pay, money transfer, etc. I created a series of pages, based of designs, to fulfill those functionality needs. This is one of many pages I created to fullfil their web and mobile needs.

dev.title: Job Rivet
dev.text: Job Rivet was a recurring client that would come back from time to time requesting new pages to add to their website. This is one of many of those fully responsive pages.

dev.title: Michelin
dev.text: Michelin was a recurring client who was constantly requesing product training. This is the start of a template for a Motorcycle course.

dev.title: AutoNation
dev.text: AutoNation requested a series of training for their Sales Managers. This is one in a series of fully responsive courses I developed.

design.title: TRW
design.text: TRW (Two Redheads and a Wolf) is a logo I designed for some friends to use for their business products.

design.title: Ashton Estate
design.text: This is a logo I created for some friends for their small sustainable farm.

design.title: On the Road Wellness
design.text: This is a logo I designed for a client that helps over the road truckers with meal planning, exercise and overall wellness.
